content.body: I wonder about the use rate of new css features like new units, new color functions
I would guess that the use rate of new css features would go up as autoprefixer/other css preprocessors add support for them, which is basically polyfilling
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I would guess that the use rate of new css features would go up as autoprefixer/other css preprocessors add support for them, which is basically polyfilling

content.body: Many features cannot be polyfilled because they don't have an old equivalent version, for example different color functions do not represent the same color  space. Units are the same
